name: Naveen Garg 0001
content: Naveen Garg Naveen Garg About Me Research Teaching Other Activities I am the Usha Hasteer Chair Professor in the Computer Science and Engineering Department at IIT Delhi. I started at this department as an undergraduate student in 1987, completed a Ph.d. in 1994 and joined as an Assistant Professor in 1997. I was a postdoc and a member of the technical staff at MPI-Informatik, Saarbruecken from 1994 to 1997. I am coordinating the UQ-IITD Academy of Research at IITD (UQIDAR). Here is a short Bio. +91-11-26591296 (O) +91-11-26591060 (Fax) naveen AT cse DOT iitd DOT ac DOT in Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Delhi Hauz Khas, New Delhi 110016
